welcome:
👋 Hello! Welcome to our bot.

Use the commands below to get started.
help_text:
🆘 How to use the bot:

🎬 /kod - Enter a code to find a video
🌐 /til - Change the language
📣 /shikoyat - Send a complaint
🔐 /maxfiylik - View the privacy policy
send_feedback: ✉️ Please type your feedback or complaint and send it to me.
feedback_thanks: ✅ Thank you! Your message has been sent.
privacy:
🔐 Privacy Policy
Introduction
This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your information when you use our Telegram bot. By using our bot, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy.
Information We Collect
- Telegram User ID: We collect your Telegram user ID to identify you.
- General Telegram Info: We may use general information (like your chosen language) provided by Telegram to generate bot statistics.
Cookies and Tracking
We do not use cookies or tracking technologies.
Data Storage and Security
- No Chat History: We do not store chat history. If you delete a message, we cannot recover it.
- Media Links: Media you upload may contain links to external websites. Please review their privacy policies before visiting.
- Advertising: Occasionally, you may see ads in the bot. Clicking on them may redirect you to external sites. Review their privacy policies as needed.
- Security: We take all measures to protect your data using modern cryptographic techniques and best practices.
Contact Us
If you have questions about this privacy policy, please contact us via @pep_xi.
subscribe_first: 📢 Please subscribe to the following channels before using the bot:
video_not_found: ❌ Sorry, no video found for the given code.
